description: Global surface water datasets (occurrence, change, seasonality, recurrence, transitions and maximum extent) aggregated over 1984 - 2020.
sci:citation: Jean-Francois Pekel, Andrew Cottam, Noel Gorelick, Alan S. Belward, High-resolution mapping of global surface water and its long-term changes. Nature 540, 418-422 (2016)

occurrence.title: Occurrence
occurrence.description: Frequency with which water was present from March 1984 to December 2020

change.title: Occurrence Change Intensity
change.description: Change in water occurrence between the two periods (1984-1999) and (2000-2020)

seasonality.title: Seasonality
seasonality.description: Number of months that water was present from January 2020 to December 2020

recurrence.title: Recurrence
recurrence.description: Frequency with which water returns from year to year

transitions.title: Transitions
transitions.description: Categorical change in surface water status from 1984 to 2020

extent.title: Maximum Water Extent
extent.description: Binary indicator of whether water was ever present (from 1984-2020)

title: European Commission Joint Research Centre - Global Surface Water (Aggregated)

guide.title: User Guide
guide.description: Data users guide and description of the JRC GSW datasets.
